newsData.title: Apple C.E.O. Gifts Trump Gold
newsData.summary: Tim Cook presented a glass plaque on a gold base to President Trump and pledged an additional $100 billion investment in the U.S. as Trump threatened a 100 percent tariff on foreign semiconductors.
